description.value:
You conjure a machine that closely resembles a construct of the Engine's Growth. The device manifests a massive growth of tangling roots and shrubs, and brings forth progress.

Machine of the Engine's Growth Speed 80 feet, burrow 80 feet

Arrive The Rise of Nature The machine whirrs to life and creates a great tangled mess of roots and shrubs in an instant. All enemies within the @Template[distance:30|type:emanation] need to attempt a Reflex saving throw. The terrain is difficult terrain to all enemies until the spell ends.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature has a -10 circumstance penalty to its land speed.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the tangled roots until the spell ends, unless it manages to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}. If the creature was flying when grabbed, it remains stuck in place.

Critical Failure As Failure, but the creature cannot Escape to break free.

Depart The Price of Progress The machine flashes red and releases a gout of flame all around it. All enemies in a @Template[distance:30|type:emanation] area need to attempt a basic Reflex saving throw or take @Damage[4d8[fire]] damage. Creatures who are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} treat their result as one degree worse.

Heightened (+1) The damage from The Price of Progress increases by 2d8 damage.

duration.value: until the end of your next turn
